title: Was Sen. Kelly Loeffler Pictured With Former KKK Member?
subtitle: Chester Doles was a member of the KKK, the neo-Nazi National Alliance, and marched with the Hammerskins at the "Unite the Right" rally in Charlottesville, Virginia.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows Georgia Sen. Kelly Loeffler with former KKK member Chester Doles.
